```{r cars}
## power analysis
power.fun.n.needed<-function(OR,power,p0){
    
    
        
        OR<-OR
        p0<-p0
        n<-NA
        power<-power
        r<-1
        design<-1
        sided.test<-2
        conf.level<-0.95
        method<-"matched"
        
        calc<-epi.ccsize(OR = OR, p0 = p0, n = NA, power = power, r = r,
                         design = 1, sided.test = sided.test, conf.level = conf.level, 
                         method = method,fleiss = FALSE)
        
        calc$n.total
}

```
